website_summaries.verdict: A versatile Bluetooth speaker that is easy to control and delivers outstanding sound quality.
pros: Floating speaker offers a great choice for use at a beach or swimming pool
Connects quickly with almost any Bluetooth-compatible device
Offers up to 10 hours of playing time on a single charge
Constructed from aluminum and silicone for long-lasting durability
cons: Delivers less bass compared to other Bluetooth speakers
Sound sometimes goes in and out when the speaker is floating in water

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound is nice but mine did not include the metal ring or a charging cord so I'm only giving 2 stars. Update... Received the metal ring and charging cord once the issue was identified. Thank you for the fast reply. We also ordered the green and orange set which had the hooks and charging cords. The dual sound is much better. Gave the initial green one to my daughter for her pool. Blue tooth distance on these is not great but the card slot option takes care of that. A must have part of our pool! Love it.... :)
customer_reviews.author: L. Staton

customer_reviews.title: Floats and is loud enough for my kayak
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with the first one I ordered, customer service was on it and took care of my issues. Sound is good enough for the kayak
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not able to play and float at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: Probably should be 2 stars but the sound quality is good and it’s not ruined if it does get wet however if mine gets splashed or any water on the top where the speaker is the sound cuts out. Makes is sound like the music is coming through a cell phone with bad connection going in and out. Once it dries out it works fine again. A little disappointing since I was wanting something to float around the pool or hang on the side while we swim and play.
customer_reviews.author: momoflots

customer_reviews.title: which is better than 2 cheaper models I tried
customer_reviews.text: I carry this on my surfski (kayak) and my outrigger canoe. It has survived getting 'dunked' in the water a few times, which is better than 2 cheaper models I tried, that didn't survive).
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: I use it around my swimming pool. Great sound and like the fact that it is waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not use in a public pool, can only be used on calm waters..
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use, but also easy to break.. We tried it on a pool, it worked initially but suddenly a punk kid jumped into the pool and caused some waves.. The speaker didnt submerge but there were definetely water inside the holes.. Unfortunately we were playing some music and it suddenly stopped.. My initial reaction was that it was battery drained and I had to charge it.. That wasnt the case because now it is not charging. I dont think its that waterproof, just keep it and use in the tub or shower.. It doesnt float that good anyway..
customer_reviews.author: Jar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect waterproof speaker
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof and floats! I was looking for a Bluetooth speaker to use while kayaking and found this gem. It holds the charge for ample time and you won’t find a comparable sound clarity at the price. I liked it so much I got a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to connect to my Andriod phone. Sound is very clear.
customer_reviews.author: AMCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: A great option for a teenager to take into the bathroom while he showers. I don’t think it’s going to be loud enough for the pool or on the boat though. It had great sound for a small speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Mendy Gehrt

customer_reviews.title: Great when new
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last year. Used it a few times for a total of about twelve hours. Sound quality was great, as was its overall performance. Pulled it out to use it this year and it is dead. Won’t do anything. So if you want a great sounding, floating speaker but this one. Just know it may not work the following year.
customer_reviews.author: Guru1200

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker! Great sound quality and hookup is easy. I can't believe it's waterproof and so inexpensive! I hang it in my shower. My only wish is that the buttons lit up or had contrast to see which button is which.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G

customer_reviews.title: Floats the Sounds I wanna hear
customer_reviews.text: A great working product for what it's meant for, I was gifted one and I purchased another for a friend's Birthday gift. Pairs well with the inflatable Amazon Jacuzzi!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Great if you keep it close to your phone. Good for kayaking/canoeing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for kayaking which is great for. Its pretty loud for its size and sound quality is pretty good. Bluetooth is great if you're within 10ft. Any farther and it starts cutting out.
customer_reviews.author: Cbbbb

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design and works great. I will be taking this to my camping ...
customer_reviews.text: Sleek design and works great. I will be taking this to my camping trip this year.
customer_reviews.author: Dounguri, LLC

customer_reviews.title: This is waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing speaker. I am very impressed that it even works in the pool! It makes it so much easier to enjoy company without the loud music in the background.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Campbell

customer_reviews.title: great sound and fast pairing
customer_reviews.text: I know this product is waterproof but I bought it to use it at work for my presentations. First of all, great sound and fast pairing. Love the size and the design. No problems at all. Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Wow ! Impressed...it really has great spund, I would recommend tjis for someone who wants to just hear great spund at a great cost, love it !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like listening anywhere even in the shower. This little gizmo is not scared of mist / splash of water, and it plays on. Better than just my cp on speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great Little speaker
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is the bomb! The sound is amazing for such a small speaker. The base is surprisingly good. I bought this to take kayaking on the river, which we haven’t done yet. That’s the only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars. I will update my review once we’ve used it a few times out on the water.
customer_reviews.author: sheri l manich

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. Not the best for floating around as water will splash onto the top and plug the holes and muffle the sound. Works great right next to the hot tub and no worries if it gets splashed or falls in. Just didn’t work floating around for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: It refuses to connect to any bluetooth device. I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: It refuses to connect to any bluetooth device. I'm still trying to get it to work but won't connect to phone, tablet, anything.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: Sound is awesome !!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised how awesome this speaker sounded! We use it at the pool and yes, it really does float while playing music! I definitely recommend this outdoor speaker!
customer_reviews.author: denise dewitt

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Use this for kayaking, great sound. Syncs to everything, even my Fitbit Versa! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Olympia

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this little speaker. Great sound quality for the size and price and it’s quite loud. It’s been in the water several times now and it”s definitely waterproof and definitely floats. So simple to use and connects to phone easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: but it has great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it in the pool yet (floating), but it has great sound quality. I plan to buy additional units to travel with
customer_reviews.author: Kaelynn

customer_reviews.title: Works Great !
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it in a Halloween display at our Charity Thrift Store where it plays spooky music 24/7 from an SD card. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie R.

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Loud enough for what I need (neighbor friendly). Does have fast forward and rewind option, you have to hold down the volume up/down button to skip tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Fielden

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little speaker with great sound! This will be perfect for pool parties and the beach - no worries since it's waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy for outdoor activity
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even make it through the first kayak trip. Karabiner snapped the CHEAP attachment . Don’t recommend this for ANY outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Device
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing device, sound is very good and i use it in my swimming pool all the time
customer_reviews.author: Saied

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker sounds great and yes I would purchase it again
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a couple of weeks but it seems to be well made. Great sound from a small package, used it the pool while on vacation. Sounded great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: great sound for a little speaker
customer_reviews.text: great sound for a little speaker. When its floating the sound goes in and out so I have it hanging by the pool. Its nice to be able to leave it out in the weather and not worry about it getting splashed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so good when you float it
customer_reviews.text: Good sound out of the water but sound goes in and out if you float it
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a hot tub!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we wanted it for. We are using it in our hot tub and it sounds good enough for us. If your looking for thumping base this is not for you. But if you are looking for a floating water proof speaker you can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Webb

customer_reviews.title: The sound could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect, but sound quality is not so good. Can improve it in a next version.
customer_reviews.author: Leandro

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for the river
customer_reviews.text: The only waterproof speaker with an SD card and bluetooth, this little guy was perfect river runs in an inner tube. Simple, durable and impressively loud for its size and battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty awesome product.Easy to set up and connected.It's very convenient to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Xiang yan

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of the speakers and linked them. I was impressed with the sound. I only gave 4 stars, because I haven’t tried them in the pool yet!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker for poolside in the summer!
customer_reviews.text: We have really enjoyed this speaker and get a lot of use of it by the pool. It’s great not having to worry about it getting wet. Sound quality is great. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: hailey

customer_reviews.title: ... kayak trips getting wet and submerged and still working like new. If you use the sd card to ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this speaker has held up to 4 or 5 kayak trips getting wet and submerged and still working like new. If you use the sd card to play music you do have to un pair it from the last device it was paired with first.
customer_reviews.author: Don H.

customer_reviews.title: Cottage season just around the corner...
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable quality! Can't wait to use it during cottage season!
customer_reviews.author: JW1982

customer_reviews.title: Nice speaker... and
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker for the pool or anywhere! For such a small speaker, I was impressed at the sound quality - it was clear, loud, and full
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I loved my Bluetooth until now it is not charging in full capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Detring

customer_reviews.title: Loud speaker
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tried in water yet but the sound is quite loud and it’s easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S. Browning

customer_reviews.title: loving it
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Very easy to use and the sounds is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: The clip broke
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, but the clip broke off from the speaker on my 2nd use. Disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Daniel Gowan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker it’s really got for the price I was surprised of the quality.. highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Norma Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great for the pool
customer_reviews.text: Does what it’s supposed to do. It was purchased to use in the pool! Definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G.

customer_reviews.title: Sound
customer_reviews.text: No noise comes out of the speaker. It will change songs but no sound comes from the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: B
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speaker have it in my kayak water splashes on it works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I love how it takes a tf card and that it has good volume.
customer_reviews.author: renebaum

customer_reviews.title: ... have tried several bluetooth speakers and I am always disappointed with the sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several bluetooth speakers and I am always disappointed with the sound quality. This one is quite good. It is also durable. I wouldn't worry about dropping it. And of course it is waterproof. The first thing my son did after we connected the bluetooth was drop it in a bowl of water just to see. I am happy to report no problem with the water! I already took it with me on one trip. Easy to connect on the first try. am looking forward to taking it to the beach this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: meh!
customer_reviews.text: the first time I use it, the plastic hang broke just with the weight of this bulky speaker. Bluetooth works up to 2 feet MAX, not really impressive, the sound is a Meh...not powerful at all, bass are almost inexistent....very low quality.
customer_reviews.author: PaolinoNYC

customer_reviews.title: Defective on arrival: Unit didn't even power up!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a nice compact product, but unfortunately didn't work for me out of the box despite charging it for over a day. Didn't even boot with the charging cable applied. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work when floating ☹️☹️☹️
customer_reviews.text: Sounds fine except if it’s floating in any type of water. I purchased it specifically because it said “floating” but they failed to mention it doesn’t work then.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie J. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great sound! Waterproof/Shockproof
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker has quite a bit of bang for the buck. The fact that the speaker is waterproof, can link up to another one if you purchase two, and it links up quickly is great. Even better is the sound quality. It sounds really good for its size. I've purchase similar speakers and have not been very impressed. Haven't tried it in my pool yet but have run around with it on my backpack and used it for workouts. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Evans

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is excellent! Like the bass
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Sounds like a heavy system, but it;'s just a small speaker!! and it floats!
customer_reviews.author: Lily Das

product_meta.title: DECALIFE ST-1 Green Portable Bluetooth Speaker - IPX7 Waterproof Floating with TWS True Wireless Stereo Sound, Micro SD/TF Card Slot for MP3 - Versatile Mega-Bass for Shower, Pool, Home, Indoors
product_meta.description:
Color:GreenDECALIFE Waterproof and Shockproof Wireless Bluetooth Speaker for Playing Music at Home, Work and Outdoor 
- Get the latest and smartest Portable Float Stereo Bass Speakers Now! 

The Great Features & Benefits: 
PREMIUM HIFI QUALITY: It's made of silicon + aluminum material (3.9" x 3.9" x 1.9 Inches) that is shock resistant and waterproof and can play up to 10 hours when full and the charging time is 3 hours. It has a TF card slot for MP3 player support MP3/WMA/WAV formats. 
2 IN 1 CONNECTIVITY: Our mini stereo has a loud speaker performance with Bluetooth connectivity which produce wireless stereo sound quality and allows you to connect to wireless speakers at the same time, with one speaker through smart-phone, and the other as the slave speaker via (TWS) Bluetooth. 
EASY ACCESS & PORTABLE: With the metal hook you can hang it close to you and enjoy listening music anywhere you go, clip it on your waist, handbag, backpack, hang on walls, tree, hammock, kayak, boat etc. 
WATERPROOF & SHOCKPROOF: It is 100% IPX7 waterproof and shock proof. You can play music under water. Output is real 5W output it is mega bass hi-fi speaker. When you pair 2pcs of the ST-1 speaker, you will have a total 10W stereo speaker like a 2.0 channel book-self speaker. It can work as a USB speaker, it can be connected to most any standard charger for small electronic devices, input voltage 5V 1.0A. 
VERSATILE USAGE: Enjoy listening music indoor or outdoor together with your love one, friends or family and let your kids have fun with this floating speaker. Bring it with you at the beach, pool, camping, hiking, fishing, kayaking, boating, bathing, cooking, working, workout, exercise, sleeping/relaxing and more. 

We Provide You 
- Top Quality Product 
- 30 Days Money Back Guarantee 

CLICK the 'ADD TO CART' and BUY this Hifi Stereo Speaker Black before this LIMITED TIME OFFER expires.
feature_bullets: ✓ LIGHTWEIGHT WIRELESS BLUETOOTH SPEAKER - Top quality aluminum and silicone Bluetooth speaker with multiple buttons for easy control such as; play, pause, next song, up & down volume, skip etc. It's just 3.9" x 3.9" x 1.9 Inches and weighs just 200 grams.

✓ HIGH-QUALITY SOUND AND MEGA BASS - Are you tired of speakers that makes your favorite music bad because of the low-quality speakers? This Bluetooth speaker has a POWERFUL crystal clear sound system with EXTRA GOOD BASE SOUND. Perfect for beach, travel, camping, festival, gym or any other activity you may like with amazing PLAYING TIME UP TO 10 HOURS.

✓ WATER PROOF and POOL ACCESSORIES: 100% water resistant and it floats, you can take it in your hand and jump into the pool. Don't worry if you drop it into deep water for your boating and swimming in beach. All the adults and kids would have fun with this speaker in your pool party, as it can play music underwater. You can also place it in your bedroom and play with white music for your sleeping.

✓ QUICK BLUETOOTH 4.2 CONNECT & PERFECT GIFT - This speaker is easy to pair and connects quickly with almost any Bluetooth compatible device such as; android smartphone, iPhone, iPad, computer, PC, MacBook etc. This amazing speaker would be a GREAT GIFT for anyone close to you on birthdays, Christmas, graduation, housewarming and much more.

✓ TF card slot for MP3 player support MP3/WMA/WAV formats. Our mini stereo has a loud speaker performance with Bluetooth connectivity which produce wireless stereo sound quality and allows you to connect to wireless speakers at the same time, with one speaker through smart-phone, and the other as the slave speaker via (TWS) Bluetooth. You can simply charge the speaker via a Micro USB cable, input voltage 5V DC 0.5-1.0A, can be connected to most any standard charger for small electronic devices.
